bibl.title: Greek, Coptic, and Jewish Magic in the Cairo Genizah.
bibl.note: An earlier version of this paper was read at the 22nd International Congress of Papyrologists (Florence, Aug. 23-29, 1998). - The Cairo Genizah can provide us with some glimpses of Greco-Egyptian magic independent of, but parallel to, the Greek Magical Papyri [P.G.M.].
bibl.seg: BOHAK Gideon, Greek, Coptic, and Jewish Magic in the Cairo Genizah.

An earlier version of this paper was read at the 22nd International Congress of Papyrologists (Florence, Aug. 23-29, 1998). - The Cairo Genizah can provide us with some glimpses of Greco-Egyptian magic independent of, but parallel to, the Greek Magical Papyri [P.G.M.].
